      private int experience
      Experience of the crew member.
      static int MIN_AGE

      boolean verifyValidity()
      Verify the validity of the Crew Member.

        ID - Crew Member ID
        experience - Experience of Crew Member

    • Method Detail

      • verifyValidity

        public boolean verifyValidity()
        Verify the validity of the Crew Member.
        A crew member is valid if his age and experience are greater than or equal to MIN_AGE and MIN_POINTS respectively.
        Specified by:
        verifyValidity in class RacePerson
        Returns:
        Return true if Crew Member is valid, else return false.

        Calculate skill as skill = (experience*100/age)
